DockManager

A class that manages multiple docks and the overlays that appear in them

Summary
DockManager
A class that manages multiple docks and the overlays that appear in them
Variables
_overlays
A queue to hold a reference to overlays added to any dock.
Functions
getDock
Retrieves the appropriate dock element from the PMOG HUD that the supplied element belongs, or should belong to.
removeVolatile
Removes any overlay that shouldn’t persist across page changes.
openItem
Creates a new XUL element with the string provided and then appends the newly created element to the dock.
toggleItem
Will toggle a xul overlay open or closed depending on its’ current state
appendItem
Appends a XUL element to the dock and renders it.
removeItem
Removes an item from the dock with animation
preventAutoClose
Prevents a XUL panel element from auto-hiding when it loses focus
openReply
Opens a messageform with the players name in the recipient box unless the messageform is already open in which case it addresses the message to the supplied player
closeCurrent
Closes the top overlay in the overlay queue.
hideAll
Immediately hides all open docks and their children (overlays).
showHidden
Opens all the docks that are closed and re-renders their open overlays.

Variables

_overlays

A queue to hold a reference to overlays added to any dock.  We use this to get a reference to the overlay to close when using the close recent key command.

Functions

getDock

getDock: function(overlay)

Retrieves the appropriate dock element from the PMOG HUD that the supplied element belongs, or should belong to.

Parameters

overlayA string representing the name of the overlay element.  Not the overlay object itself.

removeVolatile

removeVolatile: function()

Removes any overlay that shouldn’t persist across page changes.

openItem

openItem: function(itemName)

Creates a new XUL element with the string provided and then appends the newly created element to the dock.

Parameters

itemNameThe name of the XUL element to create and append

Returns

The newly created element

toggleItem

toggleItem: function(itemName)

Will toggle a xul overlay open or closed depending on its’ current state

Parameters

itemNameThe name of the XUL element to create or remove

appendItem

appendItem: function(item)

Appends a XUL element to the dock and renders it.

Parameters

itemThe XUL element to append and render to the view

Returns

The appended item

removeItem

removeItem: function(item)

Removes an item from the dock with animation

Parameters

itemThe XUL element to remove from the dock

preventAutoClose

preventAutoClose: function(event)

Prevents a XUL panel element from auto-hiding when it loses focus

Parameters

eventThe onpopuphiding event that the panel throws just before it hides itself.

openReply

openReply: function(player,
message)

Opens a messageform with the players name in the recipient box unless the messageform is already open in which case it addresses the message to the supplied player

Parameters

playerA string representing a players login.  Who the message should be addressed to.

closeCurrent

closeCurrent: function()

Closes the top overlay in the overlay queue.

hideAll

hideAll: function()

Immediately hides all open docks and their children (overlays).  Needed for Windows so that when the Browser is minimized we can hide the overlays with it.

showHidden

showHidden: function()

Opens all the docks that are closed and re-renders their open overlays.  Used in conjunction with hideAll to re-display the overlays that were hidden when the browser was minimized.

getDock: function(overlay)
Retrieves the appropriate dock element from the PMOG HUD that the supplied element belongs, or should belong to.
removeVolatile: function()
Removes any overlay that shouldn’t persist across page changes.
openItem: function(itemName)
Creates a new XUL element with the string provided and then appends the newly created element to the dock.
toggleItem: function(itemName)
Will toggle a xul overlay open or closed depending on its’ current state
appendItem: function(item)
Appends a XUL element to the dock and renders it.
removeItem: function(item)
Removes an item from the dock with animation
preventAutoClose: function(event)
Prevents a XUL panel element from auto-hiding when it loses focus
openReply: function(player,
message)
Opens a messageform with the players name in the recipient box unless the messageform is already open in which case it addresses the message to the supplied player
closeCurrent: function()
Closes the top overlay in the overlay queue.
hideAll: function()
Immediately hides all open docks and their children (overlays).
showHidden: function()
Opens all the docks that are closed and re-renders their open overlays.
